documentation.text:
Increase the stake of the sender by a value.
 @param amount The amount to stake
 @param instant if false, finish current period with
  old values and start new period with new value.
  If true, end current period without rewards and
  start a new period with the new values.
  If the current stake is 0, this should be instant.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Funds are locked until cooldown period is over"

arguments.value: Funds are locked until cooldown period is over

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Funds are locked until cooldown period is over"

documentation.text:
Withdraw staked funds from the contract.
 This will calculate the owed rewards for previous periods,
 the current interest period will end without reward.
 @param amount The amount to withdraw, capped by stakingbalance

Owner function to transfer the staking token from the contract
 address to the contract owner.
 The amount cannot exceed the amount staked by the stakeholders,
 making sure the funds of stakeholders stay in the contract.
 @param amount the amount to withraw as owner

Updates the amount of decimals used for the interest rate.
 After this accuracy, rounding will be applied
 and approximations will stack over long time periods.
 @param value The number of decimals. NOT the number to devide with.
  e.g.: to use 3 decimals, input 3 (10**3) and not 1000.

documentation.text:
Increase the stake of the sender by a value.
 @param amount The amount to stake
 @param instant if false, finish current period with
  old values and start new period with new value.
  If true, end current period without rewards and
  start a new period with the new values.
  If the current stake is 0, this should be instant.

documentation.text:
Withdraw staked funds from the contract.
 This will calculate the owed rewards for previous periods,
 the current interest period will end without reward.
 @param amount The amount to withdraw, capped by stakingbalance

Owner function to transfer the staking token from the contract
 address to the contract owner.
 The amount cannot exceed the amount staked by the stakeholders,
 making sure the funds of stakeholders stay in the contract.
 @param amount the amount to withraw as owner

Updates the amount of decimals used for the interest rate.
 After this accuracy, rounding will be applied
 and approximations will stack over long time periods.
 @param value The number of decimals. NOT the number to devide with.
  e.g.: to use 3 decimals, input 3 (10**3) and not 1000.

devdoc.author: Kasper De Blieck (kasperdeblieck@envoy.art) This contract allows Envoy token owners to stake their funds. Staking funds will reward a periodic compounded interest.

params.sender: the address of the message sender
params.signature: a signature of the contract address, senderAddress and tokensId.   Should be signed by the private key of signerAddress.

params.stakeholderAddress: The address to calculate rewards for

returns.reward: The rewards of the stakeholder for previous periods.
returns.stakeholder: The new object containing stakeholder state

claimRewards(bool).details: uses calculateRewards to get the amount owed

params.withdrawl: if true, send the rewards to the stakeholder.  if false, add the rewards to the staking balance of the stakeholder.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.instant: if false, finish current period with  old values and start new period with new value.  If true, end current period without rewards and  start a new period with the new values.  If the current stake is 0, this should be instant.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.value: The number of decimals. NOT the number to devide with.  e.g.: to use 3 decimals, input 3 (10**3) and not 1000.

params.instant: if false, finish current period with  old values and start new period with new value.  If true, end current period without rewards and  start a new period with the new values.
params.signature: A signature proving the sender  is allowed to update his weight.

params.amount: The amount to withdraw, capped by stakingbalance
the amount to withraw as owner

devdoc.title: A staking contract for Envoy tokens

_recoverSigner(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Checks if the signature is created out of the contract address, sender and new weight, signed by the private key of the signerAddress

calculateRewards(address).notice: Calculate the rewards owed to a stakeholder. The interest will be calculated based on:  - The amount staked of the stakeholder  - The weight of the stakeholder  - The amount of interest periods staked  - The base and extra interest of the contract The formula of compounding interest is applied.

claimRewards(bool).notice: Function to claim the rewards earned by staking.

stake(uint256,bool).notice: Increase the stake of the sender by a value.

updateInterestDecimals(uint256).notice: Updates the amount of decimals used for the interest rate. After this accuracy, rounding will be applied and approximations will stack over long time periods.

updateWeight(uint256,bytes,bool).notice: Increase the stake of the sender by a value.

withdrawFunds(uint256).notice: Withdraw staked funds from the contract. This will calculate the owed rewards for previous periods, the current interest period will end without reward.

withdrawRemainingFunds(uint256).notice: Owner function to transfer the staking token from the contract address to the contract owner. The amount cannot exceed the amount staked by the stakeholders, making sure the funds of stakeholders stay in the contract.
